short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools to imporve WhatsApp Web experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsApp Web Tools is a chrome extension to get extra features that improve user experience

Features:
- Rotate images by 90deg
- Avoid Enter key sending messages

Sopport me if you find this extension useful: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/rogeresteve

GitHub: https://github.com/estevE11/wab-tools
